categories: Category:Battles of the Occupation of Karthakk

nodes.text: Raid on The Trade Federation base

The Raid on The Trade Federation base took place prior to the First Battle of Geonosis, occurring when Nym's Lok Revenants and the Mere Resistance staged an assault on a Trade Federation Base to allow Jinkins to slice into the Trade Federation's planetary network to ascertain the location of Spacestation 1138 where members of the Resistance were being held, most notably Captain Orsai.

The pirate band Lok Revenants was engaged in a struggle against the Trade Federation for control of the Karthakk system. After joining forces with the Mere Revenants, Nym agreed to rescue captured prisoners. But first they had to find them.

Nym and Jinkins stormed the base but were being overrun by the Trade Federations forces. The timely arrival of Jedi Master Adi Gallia and Reti were enough to buy time for Jinkins to acquire the location and access codes to Spacestation 1138 by slicing into the Trade Federation's planetary network. Droid bombers began coming in waves from two Battleships but with the combined efforts of the pilots the mission was a success. When the battleships were destroyed, the remaining fighters lost their control signal and were destroyed.
The codes taken from the system would be invaluable for their planned raid on the station which would be the next mission for the Revenants.
This article was created based on a mission in the video game Star Wars: Jedi Starfighter. The bonus objective is to destroy the Federation battleships.
